name: Lender Optimizer
description: Supplies {{token}} to [Iron Bank](https://beta.yearn.fi/#/ironbank) or [Scream](https://scream.sh) whichever has the best yield to generate interest. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}}, then deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: Lender Optimizer
en.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Iron Bank](https://beta.yearn.fi/#/ironbank) or [Scream](https://scream.sh) whichever has the best yield to generate interest. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}}, then deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: Lender Optimizer
fr.description: Fournit du {{token}} sur l'[Iron Bank](https://beta.yearn.fi/#/ironbank) ou sur [Scream](https://scream.sh) selon  le meilleur rendement pour générer des intérêts. Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui sont ensuite redéposés dans la stratégie.

es.name: Lender Optimizer
es.description: Suministra {{token}} a [Iron Bank](https://beta.yearn.fi/#/ironbank) o [Scream](https://scream.sh), lo que tenga el mejor rendimiento para generar intereses. Los tokens ganados se recolectan, se venden por más {{token}} y luego se deposita nuevamente en la estrategia.

tr.name: Lender Optimizer
tr.description: Faiz oluşturmak için en iyi getiriye sahip olan [Iron Bank](https://beta.yearn.fi/#/ironbank) veya [Scream](https://scream.sh)'e {{token}} sağlar. Kazanılan jetonlar toplanır, daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır ve ardından stratejiye geri yatırılır.

vi.name: Lender Optimizer
vi.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Iron Bank](https://beta.yearn.fi/#/ironbank) or [Scream](https://scream.sh) whichever has the best yield to generate interest. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}}, then deposited back into the strategy.

zh.name: Lender Optimizer
zh.description: 将 {{token}} 存入 [Iron Bank](https://beta.yearn.fi/#/ironbank) 或 [Scream](https://scream.sh) 以赚取利息，哪个利息高就选择哪个。收获到的代币会被卖掉，换为更多的 {{token}} 再进行复投。

hi.name: Lender Optimizer
hi.description: {{token}} को [Iron Bank](https://beta.yearn.fi/#/ironbank) या [Scream](https://scream.sh) को आपूर्ति करता है, जो ब्याज उत्पन्न करने के लिए सबसे अच्छी उपज है। अर्जित टोकन वसूल किया जाता है, अधिक {{token}} के लिए बेचा जाता है, फिर वापस रणनीति में जमा किया जाता है।
